command.name: show
command.abstract: show the load and capacity of a link

description.p: This command shows the load and the capacity of a link.

In the following example, the load of the interface 1.0.0.2 on node 1.0.0.1 is shown. The output mentions the load (value is 3) and the capacity (value is 0).
cbgp> net node 1.0.0.1 iface 1.0.0.2 load show
3 0
cbgp>

see-also.p: To obtain the load of all the links, consider using command net traffic savenet_traffic_save.
The capacity of a link can be specified when the link is created (see command net add linknet_add_link.
